message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offers. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make a slightly more substantial concession. I'm offering it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering it to you for $102.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?
I've already made several concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm offering it to you for $100. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I've decided to take a chance and make one last offer. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. This is my final offer.
